name: Mirrorblood - Prologue
description:
Mirrorblood is a short sci-fi themed point&click adventure game in the spirit of titles such as Bladerunner 2049 and Myst. You play as Thomas Marden, a well-to-do artist and architect who through the help of the enigmatic AI 'Harvey' creates a piece of art that has some unexpected consequences. 

Accidentally transported to a hostile alien world, you must now find your way back before it's too late.

Features:

  • Explore an alien world through classic point&click mechanics
  • Combine items and unlock alien machines
  • Camera system reminiscent of early Resident Evil games
  • Atmospheric story, sound and visuals
  • 30min - 1hr of gameplay

Disclaimer:

Mirrorblood - Prologue is a prototype. It is very short and not intended to be a full game. View it as the jumping-off-point into a possible cinematic universe that may or may not become further developed in the future. It may contain bugs. It will probably not be maintained and bugs will probably not be fixed.

Minimum specs:

The game runs on Unreal Engine 5 and requires the latest DirectX drivers as well as the latest graphics card drivers. 

  • CPU: Intel Core i7 4790k
  • RAM: 16gb DDR3
  • GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070 8gb
  • Disk space:  ~1gb
